title: Olaf Q
body:
Why Olaf Q don't have the same mechanic of recharge time of Vel'Koz W, I mean he have two axes, so he can throw both of his axes instead of only 1. He can have 2 axes at one time, since he only has 2 hands ... It's pretty obvious.

Some like this

Recharge time:  16/15/14/13/12 s

Static CD: 1.5s

The damage can be reduced to 60/85/110/135/160 (+30% AD) physical damage because its more spammable if he have 2 charges and pick the axe's constanly. This can turn Olaf into a more funny champ IMO.





-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------





Edit: To be honest not only his Q need change he need a rework, his entery kit need changes, but with these Q changes he can be better Imo.

replies.body: I can hunt lebitch or nigale with this :D

Olaf win rate in jungle is : 47.83% and in top-lane: 45.52% in both roles are very down, Its obviusly that his it need a serious rework that bring him a real identity, I mean a Berseker its a champ that turn more powerful when its near to die...
His passive and his w already have near death bonus mechanics, what else does he need a 3rd one?
Because both give them the same stat: ATK SPD he need some different stat for example a passive similar to Maw of Malmortius.
His w gives bonus healing% for being low on health you realize right?

Only the active part, He need more than that. I personally make a completly new passive based on the Maw of Malmortius passive:

Olaf gain 1 of AD by every missing 2.5  % of health. (So max damage capped at 39)
The thing is that already belongs to another champion {{champion:23}} so no.
That its no a valid reason, some champs have the same or very similar ability (Zac Q and Skarner E) (Nautilus and Sion shield) (Sejuani and Aatrox Q)...
Personally and thematic fit more on Olaf that Trynda, Its a classic ability of the Berseker gain AD when are nearby to death.

Things shouldn't be changed mechanically just to fit thematically.

His Q already has a unique mechanic and it's a pretty nice ability. Early damage is crazy.

Well he is a Berseker and his kit have a lot of redundant atk speed steroids... it's a very bad kit IMO, He don't need all that atk spd, also in his R he loses stats (MR and AR) so wtf. Personally I think that Olaf is a very bad designed champ in termos of kit of sills and abilities.

yeah lol ask smashgizmo haha. this retard literally just threw on 1000 attack speed onto olaf in exchange for some of the little power left in him and called it a rework. what a joke.

Olaf needs the Maw of Malmortius passive in some part of his kit, maybe in his Berseker Rage passive. Somethinng like this:

  Olaf Grants +1 attack damage for every 4 / 3 / 2% of missing health at levels 1 / 7 / 14.

Add his actual passive in a passive component into his Vicious strike and reduce the active atk spd to 20 / 30 / 40 / 50 / 60 % 

Also remove the AD buffs of his R but keep the defenses buff during the activation and now he gains mov spd that decoys over time.

The atk spd its very redundat in his kit...

Recently On the PBE 

Olaf
Ragnarok (R) active now includes "Olaf also receives a 50/60/70 Movement Speed bonus towards enemies for 1 second."

Passive - Berserker Rage
> 
> Olaf's attack damages increases by 1 for every 2.5% of his missing health. (capped at 39 of AD)

His actual kit have much atk spd redundant, personally a bad design, so put more AD when he its nearly to dead make him feel like a true Berseker.

W - Vicious Strikes

> PASSIVE: Olaf's attack speed increases by 1% for every 1% of his missing health.
> 
> ACTIVE: For 6 seconds, Olaf gains bonus lifesteal and bonus attack speed. During this time, Olaf also gains 1% enhanced healing from all sources for every 2% of his missing health.
> 
> ATTACK SPEED: 20 / 30 / 40 / 50 / 60%

I need to Add his actual passive in someway because that make him feel like a Berseker  and turn him more "dangerous" when its nearby to die, si this passive can't be lost at all. But keep this passive have a cost and that cost is cut the active part AS. the life steal part keep at the same.

_Can't be activated during Ragnarok._

R - Ragnarok

> PASSIVE: Olaf gains bonus armor and magic resistance.
> 
> ARMOR & MAGIC RESIST: 10 / 20 / 30
> 
> ACTIVE: Olaf instantly gains the effects of Vicious Strikes at the 150%, removes all crowd control effects from himself and becomes immune to them for 6 seconds. During this time, he doubles the passive bonus and gains bonus movement speed that decoy over time.
> 
> MOVEMENT SPEED: 30 / 40 / 50 %

So with these changes he now can used his Ult to engage and init team fights like a unostoppable truck, also can use to split pushing and run away safe. He loses the flat amount of attack damage but gain a massives tools to engage on team fights rushing into key targets. Instanly start with a pumped Vicious Strikes effects to make him feel like a real Berseker for 6 seconds and a real nightmare when he is close to die. 

This Olaf its by far more funny, spamming axes like a crazy, and engage in tf like a truck, split pushing more safe, and make his Berseker thematic much revelant.
